title: In Days After Jet's Downing, A Dark Cloud Hangs Over Holland
teaser: Nearly 200 Dutch citizens died in the Malaysian airliner shot down over Ukraine. To learn about the country's response to the tragedy, Audie Cornish speaks with Thomas Erdbrink of The New York Times.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
